title: Arizmendi Bakery - Lakeshore
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A worker-owned cooperative bakery and pizzeria, part of a chain of several in the Bay Area. Usually at least a couple baked vegan treats like vegan muffin and vegan cookie, plus a vegan bread - call ahead. Arizmendi is the shortened name of Jose Maria Arizmendiarrieta, a young priest who inspired and helped found the Mondragon Cooperatives in the Basque Country of Spain in the 1950s.
